name: Benjamin SANTIAGO, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Bureau of Motor Vehicles, Respondent

parties: Benjamin SANTIAGO, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Bureau of Motor Vehicles, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of August 2012, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED and the Order of the Commonwealth Court is REVERSED based on this Court’s decision in Mohamed v. PennDOT, 40 A.3d 1186 (Pa.2012).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
51 A.3d 181
Benjamin SANTIAGO, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Bureau of Motor Vehicles, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 14, 2012.
